tool_description: Sends push notifications to mobile app users with survey reminders, supporting rich content and action buttons for immediate survey access.

survey_link.description: Survey URL for the action button

include_action_button.description: Whether to include 'Take Survey' action button

error_messages: Invalid user_tokens: Device tokens must be non-empty strings.
Empty notification_title: Notification title cannot be empty.
Empty notification_body: Notification body cannot be empty.
Invalid survey_link: Survey link must be a valid URL.
Unsupported priority: Supported priorities are [low, normal, high].
Push service unavailable: Push notification service is currently unavailable.
usage: Provide user_tokens, notification_title, notification_body, and survey_link. Set priority and include_action_button as needed. Returns delivery status and engagement metrics.

notifications_sent.description: Number of push notifications successfully sent

failed_deliveries.description: Number of failed push notification deliveries

delivery_timestamp.description: When the notification batch was sent
